text: Au gaa hai di mee deenei, idimaa, nia daangada guu hudu Au gi daha, gei gu haga milimilia di gowaa deenei i di hai tigidaumaha ang gi nia balu ieidu, nnagadilinga balu ieidu ala digi modongoohia iei digaula be nadau maadua mmaadua, be nia king o Judah. Digaula gu haga honu di gowaa deenei gi nia dodo o nia daangada ala nadau huaidu ai,
